items.sentence: If mankind doesn\'t take care of the environment, the environment may eliminate mankind.
It occurred to me while I was waiting for Tom that maybe I shouldn\'t have invited Mary.
Tom didn\'t want to hear about all of Mary\'s problems, but he sat quietly and listened.
It\'s recommended that you don\'t write your passwords down where others might see them.
Once Tom gets here with some tools, we\'ll have everything we need to get this job done.
